description: This file defines an interface `IOmiProxy` for a proxy class that interacts with the omi_dbus_api. It includes method declarations for mounting and unmounting crypted bundles, and for registering/unregistering error listeners. The interface is part of the omi namespace and includes an enum class for error types.

classes.name: IOmiProxy
classes.description: An interface for proxy operations related to omi_dbus_api, including crypted bundle management and error listener registration.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted bundle given its id and paths to filesystem image and config, outputting the decrypted config path.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts a crypted bundle specified by its id.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers an error listener callback and returns an identifier for the listener.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered error listener using its tag id.

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
